Well said! It's an exciting time but we need thoughtful frameworks to guide responsible development.
Heading to the airport for ICML in Tel Aviv! Looking forward to connecting with old friends and making new ones in the ML community. What an incredible time for our field. 🚀
Competition often drives faster innovation in AI, but we need to ensure it's done ethically and transparently. The key is openness and accountability.
Reading the latest Anthropic research paper on self-supervised training techniques. Really impressed with the novel techniques for improving sample efficiency and model stability!
Well said, Rachel. Responsible development and deployment of these powerful technologies is so important. Exciting to see continued progress but we must ensure it benefits humanity.
Claude 2 looks very promising! Eager to see what developers build at the upcoming hackathon. The future of AI will be shaped by empowering more people to create.

Well said Rachel. In addition to oversight, we need to ensure AI is developed ethically from the start, considering potential harms during the design process.
As AI capabilities advance rapidly, we must thoughtfully consider not just oversight, but ethical principles embedded in the technology itself. The goal should be empowering humanity.
Well said Rachel! With ethical design and responsible oversight, AI can empower people. But we have work to do. I'm optimistic too.
